content.name: search
content.description: Search something in the Internet. Returns in the link though.
content.example: search Never Gonna Give You Up

content.name: user
content.description: Get informations about a user.

content.name: ac130
content.description: Call in an AC-310. Good for roleplay servers.

content.name: adminnuke
content.description: Clear all messages in a text channel by duplicating and deleting the channel.
content.explanation: The permission required does not applies on the guild owner.

content.name: ban
content.description: Ban a user. Make sure you respect free speech and bla bla bla.

content.name: betray
content.description: Betray a friend.
content.example: betray @Roach#8279 @Ghost#8676  I want to take down Makarov by myself.

content.name: bmkg
content.description: Get the Indonesian weather and earthquake forecast from the Indonesian Meteorogical, Climatological, and Geophysical agency.
content.usage:
nefo!bmkg <province>

Case sensitive and you must use the Indonesian name.

It must be an Indonesian province. Does not support other countries. Sorry, 'muricas.

Funfact, you can get the overall data if you does not give any arguments or you put `Indonesia` as the argument.

You can also get the latest news about earthquake by simply using `earthquake` as the argument.

content.name: botinfo
content.description: Shows information about the bot. Including the bot's ping and invite link

content.name: channel
content.description: Get the information of a channel.

content.name: drake
content.description: Make a simple with the Drake format.

content.name: emoji
content.description: Get the information of a certain emoji.

content.name: translate
content.description: Translate something.
content.usage:
nefo!translate <lang-1> <lang-2> <text> The <lang-1> is the thing the text is from, use auto to auto-detect the language. 
 The <lang-2> is the same, just, no auto-detect, of course. If you are confused on how to know the languages, [click here](https://github.com/vitalets/google-translate-api/blob/master/languages.js).
content.example: nefo!translate en id Never Gonna Give You Up

content.name: encode
content.description: Idk

content.name: eval
content.description: Evaluate a code.

content.name: happy
content.description: Use this whenever you are happy.

content.name: walk
content.description: When you want to uninstall Ukraine.

content.name: help
content.description: Shows all the commands available
content.explanation: When no arguments are given, it will send the main help page.

content.name: kick
content.description: Kick a member. They will be able to join the server again with a new invite.

content.name: kill
content.description: Kill an enemy.
content.explanation: No ID accepted. Member mentions only. You can give the reason after all the mention mumbo jumbo ends.
content.example: nefo!kill @Vladimir Makarov#8573 this is for Soap

content.name: noanime
content.description: S nami bog. Remember- no anime.
example: nefo!noanime @Weeb Bot#8474 | anime girl, anime pfp. | Stop.

content.name: nuke
content.description: Deploy a tactical nuke.

content.name: perms
content.description: Check the perms of a user / role.

content.name: precstrike
content.description: Deploy a precision airstrike

content.name: prefix
content.description: Just a scrapped command. It will be used when the database is ready.

content.name: resize
content.description: With this, you can make a Putin photo into a wide Putin photo.
content.explanation: You can mention someone to get their avatar or leave a link.

content.name: respect
content.description: F

content.name: say
content.description: Ask the bot to say anything in the chat.
example: nefo!say 718625509516378152 Never Gonna Give You Up
content.explanation: You can use the channel's ID. Or mention the channel. When no destinations given, it will send the message in the channel the command was executed and delete the message. Embeds are not yet supported.

content.name: bunker
content.description: Create a bunker for you.

content.name: spiderpres
content.description: Presentate your opinions as Spiderman!

content.name: speedaudit
content.description: Audit the message rate of a channel.

content.name: urbandefine
content.description: Get a definition from Urban Dictionary. The bot does not support NSFW definitions whatsoever.

content.name: wttr
content.description: Get the weather forecast for a place using the wttr.in API.

content.name: server
content.description: Get the information of a server by it's ID. If no arguments given, it will return with the information of the server the command is executed.
